required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Rituximab Plus MG4101 Indolent CD20-positive Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma (NHL)
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Study of Rituximab Plus MG4101 in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory Indolent CD20-positive Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma (NHL)

brief_summary.textblock: Phase II study of rituximab plus MG4101 in patients with relapsed or refractory indolent CD20-positive non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL) Investigator-Initiated Trials

detailed_description.textblock: Multi-center trial, Phase II, non-randomized, open-label, single-arm study with combined therapy of rituximab plus MG4101 in patients with indolent CD20-positive NHLs who has relapsed or refractory to prior chemotherapy or chemo-radiotherapy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through treatment completion, an average of 25 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Investigator-assessed, confirmed objective response by revised response criteria

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through treatment completion, an average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed complete remission by revised response criteria

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of initiation until the date of first documented progression, whichever came first, assessed up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: PFS as defined by revised response criteria

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: OS as defined by revised response criteria

arm_group.description: Drug: Rituximab + MG4101 Induction phase: Rituximab (Truxima) 375mg/m2 IV Weekly (X4) MG4101 3x107 cells/kg IV Weekly (X4) Maintenance phase Rituximab (Truxima) 375mg/m2 IV q 4 weeks (X4) MG4101 3x107 cells/kg IV q 4 weeks (X4)

intervention.description: Induction phase: Rituximab (Truxima) 375mg/m2 IV Weekly (X4) MG4101 3x107 cells/kg IV Weekly (X4) Maintenance phase Rituximab (Truxima) 375mg/m2 IV q 4 weeks (X4) MG4101 3x107 cells/kg IV q 4 weeks (X4)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Histologically confirmed indolent CD20-positive NHLs (iNHLs; follicular lymphoma grade 1-3a, marginal zone B-cell lymphoma, small lymphocytic lymphoma, Waldenstrom macroglobulinemia)
2. CD20-positive iNHL patients who relapsed or progressed
3. ≥ 19 years
4. ECOG PS 0-2
5. At least one bidimensionally measurable disease (or presence of IgM paraproteinemia ≥ 2 x ULN for Waldenstrom macroglobulinemia)
6. Adequate hematologic, renal, and hepatic functions
7. Appropriate methods of contraception during the study
8. Written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Not all of the above inclusion criteria are met.
2. Prior chemotherapy within 4 weeks or radiotherapy within 6 weeks
3. Corticosteroids > 10mg/day during last 28 days
4. Evidence of CNS involvement by lymphomas
5. Active HBV/HCV infections, known HIV infection
6. Prior diagnosis of cancers within 5 years
7. Serious concurrent cardiovascular disease
8. Patients who are pregnant or lactating
